name: Sea Pet World
description:
The sea, ah, the sea ~ is the place where I grew up.
The sea wind blows ~! The sea surge gushes ~! Drifting everywhere with me ~

The sea is full of sea water, and the sea water is full of life.
70 kinds of marine exotic animals, from microorganisms to the huge sea mammals, are waiting for your raising so as to evolve!

Free download now!
